name: Elder Rang
description:
v1.3 (07-Apr) - Fixed restart bug which caused the second game to not be finishable (i.e. infinite call), and added the time to the final screen as per requests.

v1.2 (06-APR) - Fixed restart bug which caused infinite dialling, and where music settings were reset.

v1.1 (In submission hour) - Fixed balance and bugs, added more dialogue variance, details on itch page (extensive)

v1.0 Release!

____

Elder Rang is a game about keeping a conversation going with your grandmother but paying just enough attention, while also doing the things you ACTUALLY enjoy such as playing the latest video game and minting NFTs.

Make sure you pay attention to your environment too! That cat needs to be pet, the pictures need to be straight, and for some reason, the light keeps turning off?

The game is played with the mouse only. Watch out for the hints to help you learn what to do!

Don't take the game too seriously.. I had a great time while making it on Twitch! Check it out at https://www.twitch.tv/ollieboyoa
